plot: Escorting his date from "The Palace" he tries to impress her by walking her up to a Lamborghini . She is simply amazed and overwhelmed for just one second until she realizes that the 1990 Mercedes behind her is the actual car he drives.
title: Lamborghini: The Wrong Car
plot_es: Escorting his date from "The Palace" he tries to impress her by walking her up to a Lamborghini . She is simply amazed and overwhelmed for just one second until she realizes that the 1990 Mercedes behind her is the actual car he drives.
plot_en: Escorting his date from "The Palace" he tries to impress her by walking her up to a Lamborghini . She is simply amazed and overwhelmed for just one second until she realizes that the 1990 Mercedes behind her is the actual car he drives.
